title: Lecrae Interview But Don't Let That Distract You From
itunes:title: Lecrae Interview But Don't Let That Distract You From
description:
Friday 3/3- Today on the show Conscious Rapper Lecrae came to to visit and spoke upon his record with Ty Dolla $ign, politics but definitely didn't let that distract him from talking about how Remy Ma hit Nicki with a second diss record and still no reply from Nicki! So we had to open the phone lines and see how our listeners felt about the record and the no response. But one thing for sure Charlamagne was highly upset with Nicki and let it be known so much that he made her Donkey of the Day.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Friday 3/3- Today on the show Conscious Rapper Lecrae came to to visit and spoke upon his record with Ty Dolla $ign, politics but definitely didn't let that distract him from talking about how Remy Ma hit Nicki with a second diss record and still no reply from Nicki! So we had to open the phone lines and see how our listeners felt about the record and the no response. But one thing for sure Charlamagne was highly upset with Nicki and let it be known so much that he made her Donkey of the Day.
